member.name: CPLINFO
member.summary: Contains resource information and an application-defined value for a dialog box supported by a Control Panel application. The CPlApplet function of the Control Panel application returns this information to the Control Panel in response to a CPL_INQUIRE message.

member.name: CPLINFO.idIcon
member.summary: The resource identifier of the icon that represents the dialog box.

member.name: CPLINFO.idName
member.summary: The resource identifier of the string containing the short name for the dialog box. This name is intended to be displayed below the icon.

member.name: CPLINFO.idInfo
member.summary: The resource identifier of the string containing the description for the dialog box that is intended to be displayed when the application icon is selected.

member.name: CPLINFO.lData
member.summary: A pointer to data defined by the application. When the Control Panel sends the CPL_DBLCLK and CPL_STOP messages, it passes this value back to your application.
